# Load packages

```{r}
library(skimr)
```

# Load the data

```{r}
url <- "https://data.stadt-zuerich.ch/dataset/sid_stapo_sicherheitsbericht_haeusliche_gewalt_od1014/download/RCH101OD1014.csv"
if (str_detect(url, ".csv")) {
    df <- readr::read_csv(url)
} else if (str_detect(url, ".parquet")) {
    df <- arrow::read_parquet(url)
} else {
    print("File format not recognised!")
}
```
